section1.title: Eikon Imaging
section1.heading: Revolutionizing Business with AI: Eikon's Transformative Journey
section1.description: We aim to make global healthcare products and services more human-technology efficient and connected; to better address patient & care seeker needs, optimize costs & build value for all stakeholders.

section2.title: About Us
section2.description1: We at Eikon provide our services to different industries like Healthcare, NDT, Home Security to name a few.
section2.description2: Our product IDEATOR, is an AI enabled system and software solution. It has been successfully installed and performing well in hospitals and at OEMs in India. Our product is mainly used by endo-spine surgeons, urologists, orthopedics, neurologists, and radiologists. IDEATOR's main USP is the best image quality at lower X-ray Dose and seamless UI/UX.

aboutPageTitle.title: About Us
aboutPageTitle.description: This is a sample of dummy copy text often used to show page layout and design as sample layout text by Graphic designers, Web designers.

aboutPageSection1.description1: We at Eikon provide our services to different industries like Healthcare, NDT, Home Security to name a few.
aboutPageSection1.description2: Our product IDEATOR, is an AI enabled system and software solution. It has been successfully installed and performing well in hospitals and at OEMs in India. Our product is mainly used by endo-spine surgeons, urologists, orthopedics, neurologists, and radiologists. IDEATOR's main USP is the best image quality at lower X-ray Dose and seamless UI/UX.
aboutPageSection1.description3: Eikon provides a complete, customized E2E product development from ideation to realization. Our expertise in product development use state-of-the-art AI/ML solutions to address the exact pain points and requirements from end-users & market.
aboutPageSection1.description4: Once associated, Eikon assures the quality products and timely services.
